generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and trees, with pedestrians walking on them.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are prominently visible along the road, providing shade and lining the sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass areas are present alongside the sidewalk and road, particularly on the left side of the image.
- sky: The sky is partially visible through the tree canopy, appearing overcast.
- person: Two pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible parked along the sides of the road and one is driving in the foreground.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead, hanging above the road.
- traffic sign: A yellow directional traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, providing directions to various locations.
- pole: Poles supporting traffic lights and signs are visible along the road.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
